H3.text: when was the last summer olympics in the usa. 1996

A4.text: The 1996 Olympics are the most recent edition of the Summer Olympics to be held in the United States.

A5.text: The 2012 Summer Olympics were held in London, England.

A6.text: The 2028 Games in Los Angeles will mark the fifth occasion on which the Summer Olympics have been hosted by the U.S.

A7.text: The United States has hosted the Summer Games on four occasions, more than any other nation, and is planning to host the fifth.
